name: I Hate My Job
description:
I Hate My Job is a game where the office descends into chaos after a certain employee messes with objects in the office. Some tasks will make people more angry than others, and some are harmless. Do you have what it takes to turn the office into a state of chaos?

This game was made for the Brackeys 2021 Game Jam!
